Changeling [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
Trample
Other creatures you control have changeling. [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
As long as you have a full party, whenever you cast a creature spell, copy it. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
